gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 120, Mavericks 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Mavericks, 120-111. Kawhi Leonard led the way with 30 points, 10 rebounds, and five assists for the Clippers, with Norman Powell adding 21 points and three rebounds in the victory. Luka Doncic tallied 28 points, 10 rebounds, and 10 assists for the Mavericks in the losing effort. The Clippers have won 9 games in a row and improve to 17-10 in the regular season, while the Mavericks fall to 16-11.
